channel.title: Tiny Problem. Please Help
channel.description:
When i try to run my server it says this:
You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
Then i went to compile it and it said this:
You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile.
How do I fix this and get my server to run/compile?
